summary: A desperate American couple discovers all is not what it seems when they uncover a high-stakes underground scam while traveling abroad. To expose the truth and get back to the U.S., they must risk their lives to save their daughter.
cast: John Cusack|Ryan Phillippe|Rachelle Lefevre|Jacki Weaver|Luis Guzmán|Briana Roy|Jandres Burgos|Veronica Faye Foo|Alex Cintrón|Millie Ruperto|Oscar H. Guerrero|Reema Sampat|Isabelle Adriani|Sunshine Logroño|Sean Taylor|Blas Sien Diaz|Omar Cruz Soto|Luis Gonzaga|Edwin Lord|Jonathan Louis Ramos|Guillermo Fornaris|Leonardo Pierantoni|Meadow Williams
title: Secuestrada
